query.statement:
WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT substr(HOLIDAY_YMD,1,6) AS HOLIDAY_YMD , INTEGER(RIGHT(LAST_DAY( CAST(LEFT(substr(HOLIDAY_YMD,1,6),4)||'-'||substr(substr(HOLIDAY_YMD,1,6),5,2)||'-'||'01' AS DATE)),2) ) - COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM DB2WEB.TB_HOLIDAY GROUP BY substr(HOLIDAY_YMD,1,6) ) SELECT PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, TEMNM, ZZACTSS, LIFNR, LIFNRNM, TEMNO, NAMET2 , CASE WHEN CNT IS NULL THEN 0.0 ELSE CNT END AS CNT , CASE WHEN CNT21 IS NULL THEN 0.0 ELSE CNT21 END AS CNT21 , INP_RT , DEC(INP_POINT, 10,1) AS INP_POINT , CNT2_SUM , CNT_SUM , INP_RT_SUM , DEC(INP_POINT_SUM, 10,1) AS INP_POINT_SUM , DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY CASE WHEN DEC(INP_POINT_SUM, 10,1) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE DEC(INP_POINT_SUM, 10,1) END desc) AS RANKING FROM ( SELECT PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, TEMNM, ZZACTSS, LIFNR, LIFNRNM, TEMNO, NAMET2 , CNT , CNT21 , INP_RT , INP_POINT , CNT2_SUM , CNT_SUM , DIFF_MON , NULLIF(DEC((dec(CNT2_SUM,10,1)/nullif(dec(CNT_SUM,10,1),0))* 100,10,1),0) AS INP_RT_SUM , CASE WHEN (NULLIF(DEC((dec(CNT2_SUM,10,1)/nullif(dec(CNT_SUM,10,1),0))* 100,10,1),0) * CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE)) > 10 THEN 10 ELSE (NULLIF(DEC((dec(CNT2_SUM,10,1)/nullif(dec(CNT_SUM,10,1),0))* 100,10,1),0) * CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE) ) end AS INP_POINT_SUM FROM ( SELECT PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, TEMNM, ZZACTSS, LIFNR, LIFNRNM, TEMNO, NAMET2 , CNT , CNT21 , INP_RT , INP_POINT , SUM( CNT21 ) OVER (PARTITION BY LIFNR, TEMNO ORDER BY LIFNR, TEMNO ) AS CNT2_SUM , SUM( CNT ) OVER (PARTITION BY LIFNR, TEMNO ORDER BY LIFNR, TEMNO ) AS CNT_SUM , CAST(REPLACE(#DIFF_MON#, ' ', '0') AS INT) AS DIFF_MON FROM ( SELECT Q.PAPRYYYYMM, Q.MANDT , (SELECT N.DTEXT4 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE N WHERE N.MANDT = Q.MANDT AND N.CODE1 = 'PS003' AND N.LANG = 'ko' AND N.CODE2 = W.ZZACTSS) AS TEMNM , (SELECT MM028.CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028 WHERE MM028.MANDT = Q.MANDT AND MM028.CODE1 = 'PS003' AND MM028.LANG = 'ko' AND MM028.CODE2 = W.ZZACTSS) ZZACTSS , Q.LIFNR , (SELECT DISTINCT NN.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0034 NN WHERE NN.MANDT = Q.MANDT AND NN.LIFNR = Q.LIFNR AND NN.GBN = 'A') AS LIFNRNM, Q.TEMNO , (SELECT NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0002 WHERE MANDT = Q.MANDT AND TEMNO = Q.TEMNO) AS NAMET2 , SUM(Q.CNT) AS CNT , SUM(Q.CNT21) AS CNT21 , NULLIF(DEC((dec(SUM(Q.CNT21),10,1)/nullif(dec(SUM(Q.CNT),10,1),0)) * 100,10,1),0) AS INP_RT , CASE WHEN (NULLIF(DEC((dec(SUM(Q.CNT21),10,1)/nullif(dec(SUM(Q.CNT),10,1),0))* 100,10,1),0) * CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE) ) > 10 THEN 10 ELSE (NULLIF(DEC((dec(SUM(Q.CNT21),10,1)/nullif(dec(SUM(Q.CNT),10,1),0))* 100,10,1),0) * CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE) ) END AS INP_POINT FROM ( SELECT PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , SUM(CNT) AS CNT , SUM(CNT2) AS CNT2 , DEC((nullif(SUM(CNT2),0)/nullif((SELECT CNT FROM TEMP WHERE HOLIDAY_YMD = PAPRYYYYMM),0)) / CAST(REPLACE(#VAR2#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE) , 10, 1) AS CNT21 FROM ( ( SELECT Left(a.inp_dt, 4)||substr(a.inp_dt,5,2) AS PAPRYYYYMM , a.MANDT , a.LIFNR , a.tmcd AS TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , SUM(c.M_MH)+ SUM(c.A_MH) + SUM(c.N_MH) AS CNT2 , 0 AS CNT3 FROM SAPHEE.zpstw0301 AS a LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.zpstw0302 AS c ON a.inp_dt = c.inp_dt AND a.lifnr = c.lifnr AND a.perno = c.perno LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 M02 ON M02.MANDT = c.MANDT AND M02.POSID = c.PSPID AND M02.POSID_1 = c.POSID WHERE Left(a.inp_dt, 4)||substr(a.inp_dt,5,2) BETWEEN #YYYYMMF# AND #YYYYMMT# AND ( a.tuip_chka = 'X' OR (a.tuip_chkb = 'X' AND a.sayu = 'H' AND a.sayu = 'J' AND a.sayu = 'F') )
AND a.tmcd = #ZTEMNO#
AND A.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND M02.ZZGUBUN = #CHK_GBN#
--AND c.pspid IS NOT NULL AND c.posid IS NOT NULL GROUP BY Left(a.inp_dt, 4)||substr(a.inp_dt,5,2), A.MANDT, A.LIFNR, a.tmcd )
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD0#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , COUNT(PERKEY) AS CNT, 0 AS CNT2,0 AS CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD0# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , PERNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD0# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD1#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , COUNT(PERKEY) AS CNT, 0 AS CNT2,0 AS CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD1# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , PERNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD1# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD2#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , COUNT(PERKEY) AS CNT, 0 AS CNT2,0 AS CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD2# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , PERNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD2# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD3#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , COUNT(PERKEY) AS CNT, 0 AS CNT2,0 AS CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD3# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , PERNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD3# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD4#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , COUNT(PERKEY) AS CNT, 0 AS CNT2,0 AS CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD4# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , PERNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD4# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD5#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , COUNT(PERKEY) AS CNT, 0 AS CNT2,0 AS CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD5# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , PERNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD5# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD6#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , COUNT(PERKEY) AS CNT, 0 AS CNT2,0 AS CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD6# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , PERNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD6# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD7#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , COUNT(PERKEY) AS CNT, 0 AS CNT2,0 AS CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD7# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , PERNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD7# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD8#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , COUNT(PERKEY) AS CNT, 0 AS CNT2,0 AS CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD8# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , PERNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD8# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD9#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , COUNT(PERKEY) AS CNT, 0 AS CNT2,0 AS CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD9# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , PERNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD9# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD10#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , COUNT(PERKEY) AS CNT, 0 AS CNT2,0 AS CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD10# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , PERNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD10# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD11#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , COUNT(PERKEY) AS CNT, 0 AS CNT2,0 AS CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD11# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , PERNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD11# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD12#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , COUNT(PERKEY) AS CNT, 0 AS CNT2,0 AS CNT3 FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD12# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , PERNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD12# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND TEMNO != ' ' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
) AS J GROUP BY PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO
) AS Q INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0034 AS C ON Q.MANDT = C.MANDT AND Q.LIFNR = C.LIFNR AND C.GBN = 'A' AND (C.SO = 'X' OR C.SO3 = 'X') INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0002 KK ON Q.MANDT = KK.MANDT AND Q.LIFNR = KK.LIFNR AND Q.TEMNO = KK.TEMNO AND KK.DELEF = '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 W ON Q.MANDT = W.MANDT AND Q.LIFNR = W.LIFNR WHERE W.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND (W.ZZACTSS IS NOT NULL OR W.ZZACTSS != '' OR W.ZZACTSS != ' ') AND (Q.TEMNO IS NOT NULL AND Q.TEMNO != '' AND Q.TEMNO != ' ') AND C.SO5 <> 'X'
AND (C.EL_INDC = 'X' OR (C.EL_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND Q.LIFNR <> '0000008001'
AND (C.ES_INDC = 'X' OR (C.ES_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND Q.LIFNR <> '0000008001'
AND W.ZZACTSS IN ( SELECT CODE2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = Q.MANDT AND CODE1 = 'PS003' AND LANG = 'ko' AND DTEXT3 = #TEMNO# )
AND W.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
GROUP BY Q.PAPRYYYYMM, Q.MANDT, W.ZZACTSS, Q.LIFNR, Q.TEMNO -- HAVING SUM(Q.CNT) > 0 AND SUM(Q.CNT2) > 0 -- HAVING SUM(Q.CNT2) > 0 ) ) ) FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
